00091     @Override
00092     protected void initialize(String[] args) {
00093         super.initialize(args);
00094         /*
00095          * A PreferenceChangeEvent is manually generated, to force during the startup of the
00096          * program the reading of the preferences (from the node represented by the variable
00097          * 'preferenze'), and the initialization of the corresponding internal variables of the
00098          * class.
00099          */
00100         preferenceChange(new PreferenceChangeEvent(preferences, "All", "All"));
00101     }

00108         show(new DocumentClassifierView(this));

00130     private void cancelPreferences() {
00131         try {
00132             preferences.clear();
00133         } catch (BackingStoreException ex) {
00134             DocumentClassifierView.showErrorMessage(ex.toString());
00135         }
00136     }

00149     public void preferenceChange(PreferenceChangeEvent event) {
00150         try {
00151             String eventKey = event.getKey();
00152             String currentKey, defaultValue;
00153             
00154             currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.SCRAPER;
00155             Scraper=getScraperInstance(preferences.get(currentKey, mapDefaultPreferences.get(currentKey)));
00156             
00157             currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.isREMOVALSTOPWORDS;
00158             isRemovalStopWords = Boolean.parseBoolean(preferences.get(currentKey, mapDefaultPreferences.get(currentKey)));
00159             
00160             currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.STOPWORDSLIST;
00161             defaultValue=mapDefaultPreferences.get(currentKey);
00162             stopWordsList = preferences.get(currentKey, defaultValue);
00163             if (!new File(stopWordsList).isFile()) {
00164                 String message = "The specified stopwords file ("+stopWordsList+") is not valid,\n";
00165                 stopWordsList = defaultValue;
00166                 if (new File(stopWordsList).isFile() && isRemovalStopWords) {
00167                     DocumentClassifierView.showErrorMessage(message + "the default value is used (" + stopWordsList + " )");
00168                 } else if (!new File(stopWordsList).isFile() && isRemovalStopWords) {
00169                     DocumentClassifierView.showErrorMessage(message + "the default file (" + stopWordsList + ") is not present,\n"
00170                             +"the removal of stopwords has been disabled");
00171                     isRemovalStopWords = false;
00172                     preferences.put(MapDefaultPreferences.isREMOVALSTOPWORDS, String.valueOf(isRemovalStopWords));
00173                 }
00174             }
00175             
00176             currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.isSTEMMING;
00177             isStemming = Boolean.parseBoolean(preferences.get(currentKey, mapDefaultPreferences.get(currentKey)));
00178             
00179             currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.STEMMER;
00180             currentStemmer = preferences.get(currentKey, mapDefaultPreferences.get(currentKey));
00181             
00182             //(Re)Generation of the training set
00183             currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.TRAININGSETDIRECTORY;
00184             trainingSetDirectory=preferences.get(currentKey, defaultValue);
00185             if (eventKey.equals("All") || eventKey.equals(MapDefaultPreferences.isSTEMMING) || eventKey.equals(MapDefaultPreferences.STOPWORDSLIST)) {
00186                 defaultValue=mapDefaultPreferences.get(currentKey);
00187                 if(!generateTrainingSet(trainingSetDirectory)) {
00188                     trainingSetDirectory=defaultValue;
00189                     String message="The path specified for the training set directory is not valid, ";
00190                     if(generateTrainingSet(trainingSetDirectory)) {
00191                         DocumentClassifierView.showErrorMessage(message + 
00192                                 "the default value is used ("+trainingSetDirectory + ")");
00193                     }
00194                     else {
00195                         DocumentClassifierView.showErrorMessage(message +
00196                                 "and the default directory ("+trainingSetDirectory + ") is not present.\n"
00197                                 +"Classification not possible");
00198                     }
00199                 }
00200             }
00201             
00202             currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.METRIC;
00203             metric = preferences.get(currentKey, mapDefaultPreferences.get(currentKey));
00204             
00205             currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.KNN;
00206             KNN = Integer.parseInt(preferences.get(currentKey, mapDefaultPreferences.get(currentKey)));
00207             
00208             currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.MAXKNNVALIDATION;
00209             maximumKNNValidation = Integer.parseInt(preferences.get(currentKey, mapDefaultPreferences.get(currentKey)));
00210             
00211             currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.KFOLD;
00212             KFold = Integer.parseInt(preferences.get(currentKey, mapDefaultPreferences.get(currentKey)));
00213             
00214             currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.isSTRATIFIED;
00215             isStratified = Boolean.parseBoolean(preferences.get(currentKey, mapDefaultPreferences.get(currentKey)));
00216             
00217             currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.isLOGGING;
00218             isLogging = Boolean.parseBoolean(preferences.get(currentKey, mapDefaultPreferences.get(currentKey)));
00219             
00220             currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.LOGFILE;
00221             logFile = preferences.get(currentKey, mapDefaultPreferences.get(currentKey));
00222             
00223             currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.isOVERWRITELOGFILE;
00224             isOverwriteLogFile = Boolean.parseBoolean(preferences.get(currentKey, mapDefaultPreferences.get(currentKey)));
00225             
00226             currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.isVISUALIZECURRENTDOCUMENT;
00227             isVisualizeCurrentDocument = Boolean.parseBoolean(preferences.get(currentKey, mapDefaultPreferences.get(currentKey)));
00228             
00229             currentKey=MapDefaultPreferences.isVISUALIZELISTRANKEDDOCUMENTS;
00230             isVisualizeDocumentsList = Boolean.parseBoolean(preferences.get(currentKey, mapDefaultPreferences.get(currentKey)));
00231             
00232         } catch (Exception ex) {
00233             DocumentClassifierView.showErrorMessage(ex.toString());
00234             cancelPreferences();
00235         }
00236     }

00247     protected String[] readDocument(InputStream IS) throws Exception {
00248         return Scraper.getDocument(IS);
00249     }
00250     
00259     protected static List<Class> getClassesForPackage(String packagename) throws ClassNotFoundException {
00260         // This will hold a list of directories matching the pckgname. 
00261         // There may be more than one if a package is split over multiple jars/paths
00262         List<Class> classes = new ArrayList<Class>();
00263         ArrayList<File> directories = new ArrayList<File>();
00264         try {
00265             ClassLoader cld = Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader();
00266             if (cld == null) {
00267                 throw new ClassNotFoundException("Can't get class loader.");
00268             }
00269             // Ask for all resources for the path
00270             Enumeration<URL> resources = cld.getResources(packagename.replace('.', '/'));
00271             while (resources.hasMoreElements()) {
00272                 URL res = resources.nextElement();
00273                 if (res.getProtocol().equalsIgnoreCase("jar")) {
00274                     JarURLConnection conn = (JarURLConnection) res.openConnection();
00275                     JarFile jar = conn.getJarFile();
00276                     for (JarEntry e : Collections.list(jar.entries())) {
00277 
00278                         if (e.getName().startsWith(packagename.replace('.', '/')) && e.getName().endsWith(".class") && !e.getName().contains("$")) {
00279                             String className =
00280                                     e.getName().replace("/", ".").substring(0, e.getName().length() - 6);
00281                             //System.out.println(className);
00282                             classes.add(Class.forName(className));
00283                         }
00284                     }
00285                 } else {
00286                     directories.add(new File(URLDecoder.decode(res.getPath(), "UTF-8")));
00287                 }
00288             }
00289         } catch (NullPointerException x) {
00290             throw new ClassNotFoundException(packagename + " does not appear to be a valid package (Null pointer exception)");
00291         } catch (UnsupportedEncodingException encex) {
00292             throw new ClassNotFoundException(packagename + " does not appear to be a valid package (Unsupported encoding)");
00293         } catch (IOException ioex) {
00294             throw new ClassNotFoundException("IOException was thrown when trying to get all resources for " + packagename);
00295         }
00296 
00297         // For every directory identified capture all the .class files
00298         for (File directory : directories) {
00299             if (directory.exists()) {
00300                 // Get the list of the files contained in the package
00301                 String[] files = directory.list();
00302                 for (String file : files) {
00303                     // we are only interested in .class files
00304                     if (file.endsWith(".class")) {
00305                         // removes the .class extension
00306                         classes.add(Class.forName(packagename + '.' + file.substring(0, file.length() - 6)));
00307                     }
00308                 }
00309             } else {
00310                 throw new ClassNotFoundException(packagename + " (" + directory.getPath() +
00311                         ") does not appear to be a valid package");
00312             }
00313         }
00314         return classes;
00315     }

00533     private Scraper getScraperInstance(String nomeClasse) {
00534         try {
00535             Class scraperCorrenteClass = Class.forName(nomeClasse);
00536             return (Scraper) scraperCorrenteClass.cast(scraperCorrenteClass.newInstance());
00537         } catch (Exception ex) {
00538             DocumentClassifierView.showErrorMessage(ex.toString());
00539             return null;
00540         }
00541     }

00610     protected synchronized boolean generateTrainingSet(String path) throws Exception {
00611         File dir = new File(path);
00612         if (dir.isDirectory()) {
00618             Set<Set<Document>> copyTrainingSet = Collections.synchronizedSet(new LinkedHashSet<Set<Document>>());
00619             trainingSetSize = 0;
00620             for (File D : dir.listFiles()) {
00621                 if (D.isDirectory() && D.list().length > 0) {
00622                     Set<Document> documentsCurrentCategory = new LinkedHashSet<Document>();
00623                     for (File F : D.listFiles(new FileFilter() {
00624 
00625                         public boolean accept(File arg) {
00626                             if (arg.isDirectory()) {
00627                                 return false;
00628                             } else {
00629                                 return true;
00630                             }
00631                         }
00632                     })) {
00633                         String[] titleText = readDocument(new FileInputStream(F));
00634                         String titolo=titleText[0];
00635                         String testo=titleText[1];
00636                         String category=D.getName();
00641                         Document newDocument = new Document(titolo,testo,category,F.getCanonicalPath());
00642                         boolean addNewDocument=true;
00653                         for(Set<Document> currentSubSet : copyTrainingSet) {
00654                             for (Document currentDocument : currentSubSet) {
00655                                 if (currentDocument.equals(newDocument)) {
00656                                     currentDocument.addCategory(category);
00660                                     newDocument=currentDocument;
00661                                     addNewDocument=false;
00662                                     break;
00663                                 }
00664                             }
00665                         }
00669                         if(addNewDocument) {
00670                             trainingSetSize++;
00671                         }
00676                         documentsCurrentCategory.add(newDocument);
00677                     }
00678                     copyTrainingSet.add(documentsCurrentCategory);
00679                 }
00680             }
00684             copyTrainingSet=Collections.unmodifiableSet(copyTrainingSet);
00689             trainingSet = copyTrainingSet;
00690             return true;
00691         } else {
00692             return false;
00693         }
00694     }
00695     
00705     protected synchronized Set<Set<Document>> getTrainingSet() {
00706         return trainingSet;
00707     }
00708

00717         return trainingSetSize;
00718     }
